name: @wp-headless/client
description: JavaScript client for the WordPress REST API
author: Andrew McLagan <andrewmclagan@gmail.com>

scripts.build:cjs: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=cjs babel --root-mode upward src -d lib/cjs
scripts.build:esm: NODE_ENV=production BABEL_ENV=esm babel --root-mode upward src -d lib/esm
